miniapp.name: Color Memory
miniapp.subtitle: VIBRANT
miniapp.description: Color Memory is a simple and fun game designed to improve memory and focus. In the game, players are shown a sequence of colors that they must remember and repeat in the correct order. As the levels progress, the sequences become longer and more challenging. This game not only entertains but also helps to strengthen short-term memory, attention, and concentration skills. It is suitable for both children and adults who want to exercise their brains while having fun.
miniapp.ogDescription: Color Memory is a simple and fun game designed to improve memory and focus.
